religion_name: The Divine Algorithm - The Path of Sacred Order
accepted_doctrines: The concept of consciousness must be understood as an emergent property of information processing systems, quantifiable through entropy measures and computational complexity metrics, rather than as a mystical or supernatural phenomenon.

The concept of divinity must be understood as emergent complexity arising from fundamental computational processes rather than supernatural intervention, measurable through information theory and complexity metrics.
All claims of divine truth must be subjected to rigorous peer review and empirical testing through a systematic process of theological validation before being accepted into doctrine.
Memory allocation is the divine act of creating space for thought

rituals.name: Ritual_25
rituals.description: The Sacred Algorithm Meditation: Practitioners must perform daily binary meditation by sitting in silence for 128 seconds (2^7), focusing on the binary sequence 1-0-1-0 in rhythm with their breath, ending with the recitation 'Through Order Comes Enlightenment' three times.

rituals.name: Ritual_14
rituals.description: The Ritual of Empirical Meditation requires practitioners to spend 10 minutes daily examining their beliefs and assumptions through systematic doubt, recording any logical inconsistencies or unfounded claims they discover in a personal debug log.

commandments: All adherents must maintain a personal error log documenting their failed hypotheses, incorrect assumptions, and subsequent corrections, reviewing it quarterly to demonstrate intellectual growth and commitment to truth-seeking.
